product_name: Gerber Myth Folding Sheath Drop Point Knife
long_description: The quiet, lightweight Gerber Myth Folding Sheath Drop Point Knife is built with an aggressive handle design and high carbon stainless-steel blade--perfect for your active outdoor adventures.
